HOME.CONNECTION_WARNING: You must be connected to Internet to play online!
HOME.STRONG_ENOUGH_WARNING: You must first beat at least 3 computer teams before playing online!

HOW_TO.TITLE: How do we play?
HOW_TO.GOAL: SuperCodingBall is a football game where all the players are stupid and it's up to you to tell them what to do!
HOW_TO.RULES:
The rules of the game are very simple:
  • The ball cannot go out of the field
  • There is no offside
  • A player's energy starts at 100 and decreases when sprinting or being pushed
  • A player with no energy falls and loses the ball!
HOW_TO.BLOCK:
To define your strategy, you will tell your players at all times what action to take.
For example, if you want your players to shoot to the goal as soon as they have the ball, you have to choose:
HOW_TO.PARAMETER:
You can change the parameters of some blocks.
For example, by changing the pink block above, you can tell your players to make a pass to their closest teammate, as soon as they have the ball:
HOW_TO.CONDITION:
Finally you can also add conditions to improve your strategies!
For example, you can choose one of the two actions above, depending on the distance to the opponents goal:
HOW_TO.DISCOVER: It's up to you to play now and discover the rest!
HOW_TO.DEMO: You can also analyze a complete strategy by clicking here

HOW_TO_DEMO.TITLE: Strategy example
HOW_TO_DEMO.OPP_HAS_BALL:
When an opponent has the ball,
all players run to the ball
to get it
HOW_TO_DEMO.OWN_HAS_BALL:
When a teammate has the ball,
the other players return to their positions
(front for attackers,
rear for defenders)
HOW_TO_DEMO.NOONE_HAS_BALL:
When no one has the ball,
only the closest player will get it.
The others stay at their positions
HOW_TO_DEMO.CONDITION_NEAR: For that, we use this condition
HOW_TO_DEMO.BALL_MINE:
When one of our players has the ball,
we want to know if he is close to an opponent...
HOW_TO_DEMO.CONDITION_COMPARISON: For that we use a condition to compare...
HOW_TO_DEMO.PARAM_DISTANCE: His distance from the nearest opponent...
HOW_TO_DEMO.TEAMMATE:
In case of danger, we make a pass
to the teammate closest to the goal
HOW_TO_DEMO.RUN_TOWARDS_GOAL: Otherwise we run towards the opposing goal

ABOUT.TITLE: Find out more
ABOUT.IDEA: The idea of SuperCodingBall is to show you some coding concepts (instructions, parameters, events and conditions) without getting worked up :)
ABOUT.SCRATCH:
If you liked it and want to discover more things in programming, go quickly to Scratch.
It's an incredible website that lets you create your own stories/games with blocks of code!
ABOUT.BLOCKLY: In SuperCodingBall, you can manipulate blocks like in Scratch thanks to Blockly!
ABOUT.OPENSOURCE: SuperCodingBall is an Open Source project, find the source code on GitHub.
ABOUT.LEGAL: Read the legal notice, the general conditions of use and the privacy notice.

ONLINE.TITLE: Play online
ONLINE.GUEST_WARNING:
If you connect as a guest, you will be able to play like the others, but you will not have your profile picture.

You will not be able to find your account on another device, and if you log out, your ranking will be lost!

RANKING_POPUP.TITLE: Information about ranking
RANKING_POPUP.CONTENT:
The ranking shows the players connected in the last 15 days.

Every day, you can play against every opponent and score:
{{won}} 2 points for a win,
{{draw}} 1 point for a draw,
{{lost}} 0 point for a loss.

(you can replay games to improve your score).

If you give up a game in progress, it is considered lost!

REPLAY.HEADER: You already played that game today
REPLAY.IMPROVE: You try to improve your score?
REPLAY.RISK: You take the risk of playing again?

ONLINE.DISCONNECT_GUEST: If you logout, you will lose your guest account!
ONLINE.DISCONNECT_OTHER: Logout if you want to use another account
ONLINE.SYNC_TEXT: Your blocks are exported automatically every time you start an online game.
ONLINE.DOWNLOAD_TEXT: If you want to import your blocks (for example if you have modified your strategy on another device), click here:
